txt.en: Gárjan can be found at Zudramdân.\n\nYou have arrived at Zudramdân and should now speak to Gárjan.
After gaining a foothold at the dwarf-ruins of Zudramdân, Glóin hopes to expand the reach of the Gabil'akkâ in Elderslade.
'Ah! Did Commander Glóin send you?\n\n'Very good. There is much to be done, but first you'll want to report to Náth over there.'
Zudramdân can be found to the north-west of Annâk-khurfu in Elderslade.\n\nGlóin has asked you to travel to Zudramdân and rally with one of his scouts, Gárjan. You should travel to Zudramdân.
Looming over Elderslade, the ruins of Zudramdân have been claimed by the Gabil'akkâ

'As you know, our forces recently captured the old ruins of Zudramdân.

'I have sent one of my scouts, Gárjan, to bolster the forces that reclaimed it and aid in scouting the approach to Mount Gundabad. Zudramdân may prove a valuable watch-post in Elderslade, but its defences are in dire need of improvement.

'You are to travel to Zudramdân and meet with Gárjan at once!'
